4989.TW.summary: LCY Technology Corp. produces and sells copper foil products for the printed circuit board and copper clad laminate manufacturers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers 4oz, 3oz, 2oz, 1oz, 1/2oz, 1/3oz, and 9Âµm copper foils, as well as thin, very low profile, double treatment, and reverse treatment copper foils. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
